item.description:
Coffee Talk is trying to find more activities for our members in the Meriden area. Let's try out the Coffee Beanery.

 A. http://westfield.com/meriden/ourstores/details/coffee-beanery-the-9084.html

westfield.com/meriden/ourstores/details/coffee-beanery-the-9084.html

Coffee Beanery, The Coffee Beanery is known for their 100% Arabica coffee from all over the world and offers an enticing selection of specialty and gourmet coffees, teas and pastries. Location & Parking Tips Level 2 Store 2220 Located in the upper level Sears wing, ample parking is available in the parking deck near Sears.

B. http://www.coffeebeanery.com/

www.coffeebeanery.com/

 C. http://westfield.com/meriden/

westfield.com/meriden/

The Beanery does not have seating inside but there is seating outside of the Beanery in the mall hallway. This Beanery is near the Food Court, so we can go to the Food Court to get something to eat after a cup of coffee. If there is any bad weather, then this Meet Up will be cancelled.

Mike B.

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes or Maybe.
item.name: Coffee Talk at the Coffee Beanery at Westfield Meriden Mall
